channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 4 Red Barracks Road, 7th September
item.description:
It is not fixed!!!!!! What is going on?????

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Red Barracks Road, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wrong sign installed, 7th September
item.description:
On the traffic signal circled in red, there are two signs to the left of the lights. They are both NO LEFT TURN, one on top of the other. However, I believe the bottom sign should in fact be a EXCEPT CYCLES sign, as in the traffic signal indicated by my red arrow. Please could this be looked into ? Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bury Place, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General Waste Bag Fly-tipping â€“ Overbury Avenue, 7th September
item.description:
Dear Bromley Council, I would like to report a case of fly tipping in my area. A general waste bag containing rubbish has been left on the street. Could you please help arrange for it to be removed? Location: 2B Overbury Avenue Details: A standard waste bag with rubbish inside, left on the ground. Thank you for your assistance in keeping the area clean. Kind regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Overbury Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A sofa has been dumped in the Bin rooms, 7th September
item.description:
Cannot access bin room due to the sofa being in the middle of the entrance door. The recident of 15 Dibdin apartment (3rd floor) threw it there and then moments later his new sofa was delivered.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Blackfriars Road, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
